hero.title: Prevention is Key
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive bone health resources designed specifically for Asian women

alert.title: Important Health Notice
alert.description: Asian women are at higher risk for osteoporosis due to genetic factors, body frame size, and dietary patterns. Early detection and prevention are crucial for maintaining bone health.

evidence.title: Clinical Research Evidence
evidence.subtitle: Scientific evidence supporting osteoporosis risk in women
evidence.description: Osteoporosis Risk: Asian women generally have lower bone mineral density (BMD) than other groups, placing them at higher risk for developing osteoporosis. This prevalence is higher, particularly among postmenopausal women.
evidence.citation: Lo JC, Pressman AR, et al. Osteoporosis and fracture among older US Asian adults. Curr Osteoporos Rep. 2023;21(4):374-383. PubMed PMID: 37542683

about.title: About StrongHer
about.subtitle: Dedicated to creating fracture-free futures for women through education, awareness, and culturally-sensitive bone health resources.
about.culturalDesc: Understanding unique health challenges facing Asian women
about.evidenceDesc: All content backed by clinical research and medical expertise
about.accessibilityDesc: Free resources available in multiple languages
about.preventionDesc: Emphasis on early detection and lifestyle interventions
about.languagesDesc: Making information accessible across Asian communities
about.resourcesDesc: Comprehensive materials for bone health awareness
about.title: Empowering Asian Women's Bone Health
about.subtitle: Dedicated to raising awareness about osteoporosis risk factors specific to Asian women, providing culturally-sensitive resources, and promoting early detection through evidence-based education.
about.storyP1: Asian women face a significantly higher risk of developing osteoporosis compared to other ethnic groups, yet awareness and culturally-appropriate resources remain limited.
about.storyP2: This platform was created to bridge that gap, offering comprehensive bone health information tailored specifically for Asian women's unique needs, genetic factors, and cultural contexts.
about.storyP3: Working in partnership with the Royal Osteoporosis Society, we provide evidence-based resources that are both medically accurate and culturally relevant.
about.creator: About the Creator
about.creatorBio: Passionate about addressing health disparities in Asian communities, Shiva recognized the critical need for culturally-sensitive bone health resources. With a commitment to evidence-based education and community empowerment, this platform represents a dedication to improving health outcomes for Asian women worldwide.
about.joinDesc: Help us spread awareness about bone health in Asian communities. Share our resources, provide feedback, or get involved in our advocacy efforts.

feedback.title: Your Feedback Matters
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve our bone health resources and make them more valuable for the Asian women's community. Your input drives our improvements.
feedback.submitted: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We appreciate you helping us improve our resources for the community.
feedback.formDesc: All feedback is anonymous and helps us serve the community better

assessment.title: Bone Health Risk Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Take our comprehensive assessment to understand your bone health risk factors and receive personalized recommendations.
assessment.step1Desc: Age, ethnicity, and basic health information
assessment.disclaimerText: This assessment is for educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical advice. Please consult with your healthcare provider for proper diagnosis and treatment.
